mapper.select: select r.* from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on(r.id = ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on(u.id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName}
select r.id, r.name, r.remark, rm.menu_id as menuId from sys_role r left join sys_role_menu rm on(r.id = rm.role_id) where r.id = #{roleId}
